causes_communes: losing focus before a key point
to think about or discuss tactics at a key point
falling behind in a key game

debutant.probleme: When losing focus before a key point
debutant.solution: Call a time-out to get your concentration back.

debutant.probleme: To think about or discuss tactics at a key point
debutant.solution: Call a time-out when you are receiving mostly if you have a good idea what the opponent will serve, and are debating how you should return that serve.

intermediaire.probleme: When falling behind in a key game
intermediaire.solution: Call a time-out to make sure you are focused and rethink your tactics.
Call the time-out earlier in the hope of not being in this situation, where the time-out will rarely help.

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice focusing and regaining concentration during a training session.

erreurs_a_eviter.erreur: Waiting until you are way behind before calling a time-out
